knimeNode.name: Extract Time Window
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts all rows within the specified time window.

fullDescription.intro: Extracts all rows where the time value of the selected column lies within a given time window from the input. The time window is specified by a start and end date (and time).
fullDescription.option: Select the input column containing date/time stamps.
Start date/time of the time window.
End date/time of the time window.

ports.outPort: Filtered table containing only data within time window.
